entry.title: Premium live-service games are failing. Why is Diablo 4 a success? | Gaming ‚Äì Polygon
entry.summary: Live-service gaming is in a difficult, transitional moment. Even as the sector consumes more and more millions of player hours, successful new launches are few and far between, and the frequency of sh...
entry.content: Live-service gaming is in a difficult, transitional moment. Even as the sector consumes more and more millions of player hours, successful new launches are few and far between, and the frequency of shutdowns has increased. Franchises like Destiny and Overwatch have pivoted to free-to-play models in an attempt to keep their player numbers buoyant, and […]

While they are non-commutative, they do keep many other properties of the complex numbers: Being non-commutative, the quaternions do not form a field. [‚Ä¶]

entry.title: Random Permutations (Part 14) | The n-Category Caf√©
entry.summary: More detail on the Cycle Length Lemma, a basic result in the theory of random permutations. We prove a categorified version of this result, which is an equivalence of groupoids, and then derive the or...
entry.content: More detail on the Cycle Length Lemma, a basic result in the theory of random permutations. We prove a categorified version of this result, which is an equivalence of groupoids, and then derive the original version by taking groupoid cardinalities.
